title: Modern Semi-Detached House
description: Beautifully renovated semi-detached property in a quiet residential area. Features a modern kitchen, spacious living room, and landscaped garden.

title: Spacious Victorian Terrace
description: Charming Victorian terrace with original features throughout. High ceilings, large windows and a south-facing garden make this a bright and airy home.

title: Contemporary City Apartment
description: Stylish city-center apartment with fantastic views. Open-plan living space, high-spec kitchen and secure parking included.

title: Rural Detached Cottage
description: Idyllic countryside cottage with stunning views. Recently renovated throughout while maintaining rustic charm and character.

title: Executive Detached House
description: Impressive executive home on a quiet cul-de-sac. Double garage, large driveway, and beautifully maintained garden with patio area.

title: Converted Warehouse Apartment
description: Stunning conversion in former textile warehouse. Industrial features include exposed brick walls, steel columns and high ceilings.
